data.title: Connections of Michele Pizzarotti: List of %nb
data.meta_description: Find Michele Pizzarotti's first- and second-degree connections within listed and unlisted companies on MarketScreener
data.text:
Financial ConglomeratesFinance

Mipien SpA operates as a holding company with interests in financial services. The company is headquartered in Parma, Italy.

Engineering & ConstructionIndustrial Services

Impresa Pizzarotti & C. SpA provides construction and public works services. The company was founded by Gino Pizzarotti in 1910 and is headquartered in Parma, Italy.

Engineering & ConstructionIndustrial Services

Impresa Pizzarotti & C. SpA provides construction and public works services. The company was founded by Gino Pizzarotti in 1910 and is headquartered in Parma, Italy.

Engineering & ConstructionIndustrial Services

Impresa Pizzarotti & C. SpA provides construction and public works services. The company was founded by Gino Pizzarotti in 1910 and is headquartered in Parma, Italy.

Publishing: NewspapersConsumer Services

Gazzetta di Parma Srl is engaged in publishing newspapers. The company was founded in 1735 and is headquartered in Parma, Italy.

Real Estate DevelopmentFinance

Compagnia Investimenti Sviluppo SpA engages in real estate development and investment projects. It specializes in the reclamation of industrial zones and creation of theme parks, logistics platforms, and hospitality structures. It focuses on aggregating private, industrial, and financial capital for new investment initiatives. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Verona, Italy.

Engineering & ConstructionIndustrial Services

Impresa Pizzarotti & C. SpA provides construction and public works services. The company was founded by Gino Pizzarotti in 1910 and is headquartered in Parma, Italy.

Engineering & ConstructionIndustrial Services

Autostrade Lombarde SpA engages in the design, construction, and management of highways and roads. The firm owns the highway concession for the interconnection between the provinces of Milan and Brescia. It also involves in related infrastructure services. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Brescia, Italy.
